data.expected_result: The profile closes when going to the store
data.short_description: [REPOST] The profile stays in the same place when click in "View in Store" in a game that's not in the store at a user's profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a friend playing a game (in this case, Grand Theft Auto V) - Go to his profile and click "View in Store" - Observe the profile
